Posts.EditableText:
Whenever I try to edit my game, I get the following error message:

**Failed to load game**

Failed to load game due to the following errors:
* Error: Exception of type 'System.OutOfMemoryException' was thrown.

The only option is to click "OK", which then takes me to the main page.

I tried playing my game, and it worked, so... anyone know what's going on?
Posts.HTML:
Whenever I try to edit my game, I get the following error message:

Failed to load game

Failed to load game due to the following errors:

  • Error: Exception of type 'System.OutOfMemoryException' was thrown.

The only option is to click "OK", which then takes me to the main page.

I tried playing my game, and it worked, so... anyone know what's going on?

Posts.EditableText: It's a server issue,  not the game
Posts.HTML: It's a server issue, not the game

Posts.EditableText: I have the same issue. Any way to edit the game anymore?
